value:
I hope Mom isn't getting too lonely...
When this war's over, I need to get
home and visit her grave...

My world's crawling with evil, so you
gotta be tough to survive. That's why
I need to get even stronger!

When I get home, I want to rebuild
my village. After that, I'll go on a
voyage—and train on the open sea!

Y'know, my mom knew a little magic,
so I thought I might be able to use
some too, but— H-hey, don't laugh!

I train ALL the time. I have to if I'm
going to be the greatest warrior in all
of Renais! How else will I surpass Dad!

I'm son of the warrior Garcia, Ross.
N-no! Not "Son-of-warrior-garcia-
ross"! First Lute, and now you too?!

I, Ross, son of the warrior Garcia,
armed with my axe, am a destroyer
of swords! Only a fool would test me!

I guess I've been getting a big head,
huh? No one's invincible.

Not good enough! If I want to surpass
Dad and Sir Gerik, I must overcome
all my weaknesses!

Thanks. I'll do my best with this.
I have to if I want to be a warrior
worthy of the title “son of Garcia.”

I'm son of the warrior Garcia, Ross.
Don't be fooled by the way I look...
I'm actually pretty good. Let's go!

Dad was a military leader in the
Renais army, you know. People say
he had the strength of a demon.$k$pMy Mom...Risa...the way Dad told it,
she was a lot like Princess Eirika. She
was beautiful AND strong...$k$pStrength isn't just physical. Mom
knew how to support those in pain...
And Dad loved that about her.$k$pThat's why I'm getting as strong as
I can! So I can restore my mom's
resting place to its rightful beauty.$k$pAnd I'm getting stronger really fast
thanks to you summoning me here.
So, thanks, $Nu!
(exertion)
(exertion)
(exertion)
(exertion)
Can't beat me!
I'm a warrior!
Just like my father.
On this axe!
To the very end!
Ha ha!
My name is Ross. I'm the son of warrior Garcia, and the best in Ide!
What? Agh, you got me! I'll get you back -- just wait!
You've got to fight for what matters to you! That's what it means to be a warrior. My father taught me that!
A summoner? Gates to other worlds...? Sounds...complicated.
I will destroy swords with my axe, just like my father did.
Someday... I'll go home and rebuild my village. It's where my mother's grave is...
I may have a lot to learn, but I'll still do my best to protect you.
Sure.
Uh...
Yeah!
